text: Hermanniidae is a family of oribatids in the order Oribatida. There are at least 3 genera and 80 described species in Hermanniidae. ==Genera== * Galapagacarus P. Balogh, 1985 * Hermannia Nicolet, 1855 * Neohermannia Bayoumi & Mahunka, 1979 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Acariformes
title: Hermanniidae
